javax.crypto
类 NullCipher

java.lang.Object
  javax.crypto.Cipher
      javax.crypto.NullCipher

public class NullCipher
extends Cipher

This class provides an identity cipher that does not transform the input data in any way. The encrypted data is identical to the plain text.

从以下版本开始：
Android 1.0
